title: "CRUISE" Director Robert Siegel
description:
tktktk

 

 

Robert Siegel is the director of the new movie, "CRUISE", a love story built around the world of illegal drag racing in New York in the 80s. Matt was part of that scene in the 90s, so naturally, we had to watch the movie and talk to the man who made it. 


 Watch the trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=re94HhimjH8

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/GtiV_-0BDqE

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
